summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 10, 2019. It documents routine institutional operations, staff leave, and inmate statuses, including noting that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) from Psychological Observation.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76813-054, who was transferred from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on July 10, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Placed in Special Housing Unit
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76813-054) was transferred from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The report is a routine daily log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated July 11, 2019, covering activity from July 10, 2019.
Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (designated #76813-054) was placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) after being held in Psychological Observation.
The report notes staff shortages affecting correctional assignments and lists various other inmates by number and code in the SHU.
The document provides a snapshot of institutional totals, staff overtime, and leave usage for the date, showing standard prison administrative functions.
